case.title: Wife material looking for a marriage minded Man. - 34 (Financial District)
case.text: I am a single deaf and successful woman, I weigh 135 ibs, 5'8 and a brown long hair, I like fishing, camping, travelling, swimming and hiking. I am well educated and I've travelled a fair bit around the world due to the nature of my job, I am looking for a Man that understands the term Unconditional lover and he's ready to love and be loved unconditional. I prefer a man of age 33+, please be single, I'm open to any race and you having a kids shouldn't stop you from writing me so far you are interested in having more kids.
